QuestData.Title: Tiragarde Sound
QuestData.Description: We must convince Katherine Proudmoore to pledge Kul Tiras to the Alliance. Flynn believes the Ashvane Trading Company's new gunpowder is our best lead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Offer to investigate the Ashvane Trading Company.
QuestData.RewardText: Maybe with your help we can restore the people's faith in Proudmoore leadership.
